General.Name: Thac Ba Hydropower JSC
General.Description: Thac Ba Hydropower Joint Stock Company engages in the generation and trading of electricity in Vietnam. The company operates the Thac Ba hydropower plant in Yen Binh district, Yen Bai province. It is also involved in the management, operation, repair, maintenance, overhaul, and renovation of hydraulic works, architectural works, and equipment of hydropower plants, and transformer stations; and testing and calibrating of electrical equipment. In addition, the company buys, sells, exports, and imports materials and equipment; and offers consultancy services on development of construction investment projects, construction investment management, construction supervision, and installation of electrical works. Further, it invests in power grid and power source works; and provides training on management, operation, maintenance, and repair of power plant equipment, as well as business travel services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yên Bình, Vietnam. Thac Ba Hydropower Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Refrigeration Electrical Engineering JSC.
